description: Level I is the foundation for understanding the advanced techniques discussed in levels II and III: Recognizing a writerâ€™s core personality, interpreting combinations of handwriting characteristics, identifying handwriting features for relationship compatibility, vocational guidance, and pre-employment selection and employee management, identifying conscious and subconscious or unconscious behavioral controls, identifying self-concept of strengths and weaknesses, integrity, and work ethic, revealing behavioral or personality disorders, medical and/or mental illnesses, and dangerous behavior.
title: Measurement-Based Handwriting Movement Analysis 1
